title: This damn fine Kha'Zix game got me an A-. I've gotten S flats in games where I didn't do this good.
body:
Title. I've gotten S flats in games where I didn't do as good as I did in this one (As Kha'Zix, mind you), and got an A- from my performance last game. Some screenshots:
My team's KDA: https://gyazo.com/34f7c606a276b1ed663f32187db4b872
Damage dealt: https://gyazo.com/1e5d3ab6a4e4b8e448f2a7df4e2f399b
Damage taken and Vision Score: https://gyazo.com/c648a4956113c0461d0d900cb4d0b373
Towers/Inhibs off'd: https://gyazo.com/b91b218b25c7af640b5607cb509a3a08

I've done half the stuff I've done in this game and gotten an S flat. Where did I go wrong in this one? By all accounts, it doesn't make sense...

replies.body: How long was the game? Your farm seems fairly low tbh..... Im willing to bet that is most of it right there. Depending on the length of the game as well, that really could determine the difference.

It was 40 minutes long, rounded up. The two factors that I think stopped me from getting an S are my Control Wards and, as you pointed out, farm. Thinking on it again, out of the two, I think my low farm was the big one the messed me up.
You realize rankings are based on averages for the champion, lane and player rank, not some magical value that is the same everywhere?
Yes; I've had games where I went 6/4/10 and was behind a level (as Kha'Zix), and got an S flat somehow. That was three days ago.
